titleStmt.title: A collection of His Majesties gracious letters, speeches, messages, and declarations since April 4/14 1660
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notesStmt.note: In this issue p. 55 begins : His Majestie's speech.
The last document in this edition is dated 25 October, 1660.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
